comments.author: jr@heisey.org
comments.creator: jr@heisey.org
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

* I have FF 7 open with two tabs. One to a intranet site and one to http://www.broadrippletickets.com/broadway/hair/san-francisco-hair-tickets.php.
* I opened the tool DbgView or DebugView from microsoft to capture trace output of r my own development needs.


Actual results:

I observed Firefox repeatedly sending trace output to this application's window.

Examples:
[9948] { progress = 0.0236917322417869, targetWidth = 4.12236141007093, maxWidth = 174, progressStart = 0, progressEnd = 0.4, splashScreenProgress = 0 } 
[9948] CurrentPage:3 

* 9948 is the Process ID for Firefox at this moment.


Expected results:

The release version of Firefox should send no trace output to this Windows trace output mechanism of Windows. This interferes with my own development work.

This needs to be fixed ASAP due to the frequency of the output.
